equations.name: Example entry
equations.description: Not a real equation, just an example of the possible descriptors for one.
UTF-8: Similar to ascii art; a Unicode representation of the equation
possibly split over several lines as an array of strings
so that it's easy to see the equation in the raw JSON.

AsciiMathML.description: Markup for math in the browser.

eqn.description: Preprocessor for writing equations in troff.

LaTeX.description: Documentation markup language designed for technical writing.
